message.content: Yes, the authors mention the computing infrastructure they used for the experiments. They used a workstation with Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700K CPU 3.60GHz and 32 GB of RAM with an NVIDIA GTX 1080 GPU.

Yes, the authors mention the computing infrastructure used for their experiments. They state that all experiments were performed on a workstation with Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700K CPU 3.60GHz and 32 GB of RAM with an NVIDIA GTX 1080 GPU.
